title: News digest [No. 5]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Demonstrates the usefulness of a helicopter for fire-spotting, and foam for extinguishing a car fire; Streeton’s descendants open his old home to the public, show many paintings; Latrobe Valley Aero Club caters for country flyers; at Harcourt an old sailor remembers the past as he models sailing ships.
